cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine at night. I help you see, what could I be?

hints.text: 💡 I come out when the Sun goes to sleep.
✨ I twinkle high up in the sky.
🌕 Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a crescent.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I rise in the morning.
🌞 You need sunglasses to look at me.
😎 I help plants grow.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun. We live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants and animals live here.
💧 I have lots of water.
🏠 You are living here right now!

cosmos.question: I travel around the Earth, and sometimes block the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change shape every night.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🌚 Sometimes you can only see a small sliver of me.

cosmos.question: I am made of many, many stars! I'm like a big, starry family. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I'm so big, you can't see all of me.
💫 I have a name that sounds like a treat made from milk!
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts study me

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets going around a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 Earth is part of me!
☀️ The star at my center gives us light and warmth.
🚀 People explore it with rockets!

cosmos.question: I am a big red planet. People want to visit me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am the color of a certain kind of chocolate.
🤖 Robots have already driven around on me.
🚀 Maybe you'll visit me someday!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One of me looks like a big bear.
🏹 Another one looks like a hunter with a bow and arrow.
✨ You can find me at night!

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system and have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am a gas giant
🔴 My big red spot is a storm!
🌌 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a frozen rock or dust that flies through space and sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of ice and dust.
☄️ I can have a bright tail as I fly close to the sun.
🔭 People watch me through telescopes.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to chase string.
🐈 I am a furry pet.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
💛 I am often yellow when I am little.
🌧️ I like to swim when it rains.

animal.question: I like to say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass.
⚫ I often have black and white spots.
👨‍🌾 You can find me on a farm.

animal.question: I jump and have a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
💪 I have strong legs for hopping.
👶 I carry my baby in my pouch.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big.
💦 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.
🦁 I am a big cat.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I am black and white and eat bamboo. What am I?

hints.text: 🇨🇳 I come from China.
🐼 I am a type of bear.
🌿 I eat a lot of one plant!

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🇿🇦 You can find me in Africa.
🍂 I like to eat leaves from high up.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a fish.
🌊 I live in the sea.
🦷 I have many rows of sharp teeth.

animal.question: I have a shell on my back and walk very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏠 I carry my home with me.
